long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DataLink's CareBook Connect streamlines workflows and eliminates the need to toggle between multiple applications by overlaying on top of EHR systems and integrating the functionality of Evoke360 for a 360-degree view of the patient’s health on one screen.  CareBook Connect utilizes patient matching algorithms to display a patient scorecard that includes data on open care gaps, suspected chronic conditions and medications. This clinical data enables a more proactive approach to patient care with comprehensive insights that help address timely gap closure at the point of care.
